title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
steps: Boil pasta in salted water until al dente
Cook pancetta until crispy
Whisk eggs and cheese together
Combine hot pasta with pancetta fat
Mix in egg mixture to create creamy sauce
Season with black pepper and serve

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
steps: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices
Grill chicken until charred
Sauté onions and garlic
Add spices and tomato paste
Simmer with crushed tomatoes
Add cream and grilled chicken

title: Vegetarian Buddha Bowl
summary: A nutritious bowl packed with quinoa, roasted vegetables, avocado, and tahini dressing.
steps: Cook quinoa according to package instructions
Roast sweet potato cubes in the oven
Toss chickpeas with olive oil and spices
Assemble bowl with greens, quinoa, and toppings
Drizzle with tahini dressing

title: Beef Tacos
summary: Flavorful ground beef tacos with fresh toppings and homemade seasoning.
steps: Brown ground beef in a skillet
Add taco seasoning and water
Simmer until thickened
Warm tortillas
Assemble tacos with beef and toppings

title: Classic Caesar Salad
summary: A timeless salad with crisp romaine, croutons, parmesan, and creamy Caesar dressing.
steps: Chop romaine lettuce into bite-sized pieces
Toss lettuce with dressing and lemon juice
Add croutons and parmesan
Serve immediately

title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
summary: A quick and healthy stir-fry with colorful vegetables and a savory sauce.
steps: Heat sesame oil in a wok
Add vegetables and stir-fry for 5 minutes
Add soy sauce and cook for 2 more minutes
Serve over rice or noodles

title: Banana Bread
summary: Moist and delicious banana bread with a hint of cinnamon.
steps: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C)
Mash bananas in a bowl
Mix in melted butter, sugar, egg, and vanilla
Add flour and mix until combined
Pour into a loaf pan and bake for 1 hour

title: Shrimp Scampi
summary: Garlicky shrimp served over linguine with a buttery white wine sauce.
steps: Cook linguine according to package instructions
Sauté garlic in butter
Add shrimp and cook until pink
Deglaze with white wine
Toss with cooked linguine and parsley

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
summary: Classic soft and chewy chocolate chip cookies.
steps: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C)
Cream butter and sugars
Add eggs and vanilla
Mix in flour and chocolate chips
Drop spoonfuls onto baking sheet and bake for 10 minutes

title: Beef Burger
summary: Juicy beef burger with all the classic toppings.
steps: Form beef into patties
Grill patties to desired doneness
Add cheese during the last minute of cooking
Toast buns and assemble with toppings
